details.output: ERROR: Configuration file not found: hms-esr/config/production.json

details.description: The HMS-ESR component failed to start. This is affecting the operational status of the HMS ecosystem and should be resolved as soon as possible.
suggested_actions: Check the HMS-ESR logs for error messages
Verify all dependencies for HMS-ESR are available and correctly configured
Check for recent changes that might have affected the component's ability to start
Verify environment variables and configuration files
